hero.title: Isoart - EPS and PIR Solutions for Civil Construction
hero.description: Experts in thermal solutions with EPS and PIR for civil construction, packaging and insulation. Roofing, ceilings, moldings and more.

slide1.title: Decorative moldings
slide1.description: EPS moldings for doors, windows and walls. Lightweight, durable and easy to install, ideal for decorative finishes in indoor and outdoor environments.

slide2.title: EPS products for civil construction
slide2.description: EPS materials such as slabs, blocks and flakes for civil construction. They provide cost reduction, lightness and thermal insulation, serving residential and commercial projects.

slide3.title: Roofing and Panels
slide3.description: Isoart roofing and panels for roofs and facades. Available with or without EPS/PIR thermal insulation, they offer energy efficiency and resistance. Suitable for various construction projects.

defaults.heroDescription: Discover the ideal solution for efficient roofs with superior thermal insulation.
defaults.categoryDescriptionTitle: Isoart Thermal Roofing offers lightness, economy and excellent thermal performance, optimizing construction and ensuring comfort at lower cost.
defaults.categoryDescriptionText: Isoart Thermal Roofing is a lightweight and efficient solution for civil construction, replacing traditional systems with advantages. Produced with expanded polystyrene (EPS) or polyisocyanurate (PIR) cores and galvalume steel coating, it provides lighter structures, reduced foundation load and greater construction agility. In addition to excellent thermal performance, it allows significant savings in concrete, steel and labor, being ideal for projects that require productivity, comfort and cost-effectiveness.

defaultBenefits.title: Guaranteed Efficiency
defaultBenefits.description: Solutions that deliver the best performance.

generalCharacteristics: Custom adaptations of height, width and length
Lower load on structure with excellent mechanical performance
Easier to transport and assemble, optimizing construction time
Lower consumption of resources such as concrete, steel and wood
Thermal comfort and noise reduction in internal environments
Receives plaster and mortar with excellent adhesion
defaults.applicationsTitle: Greater economy, agility in execution and thermal comfort with less structural effort
defaults.applicationsDescription: Isoart Thermal Roofing is manufactured with expanded polystyrene or polyisocyanurate blocks, providing lighter roofing, with lower consumption of concrete and steel, easy handling and excellent thermal insulation. Ideal for works that require speed, performance and cost reduction.

tabDescriptions.Structural load relief: Isoart Thermal Roofing significantly reduces the load on the structure, allowing lighter and more economical projects without compromising safety or durability.
tabDescriptions.Construction economy: With lower consumption of materials such as concrete and steel, Thermal Roofing optimizes costs and accelerates the schedule, offering high construction efficiency.
tabDescriptions.Project flexibility: Customizable in dimensions and finishes, these roofing tiles adapt to various projects, from residences to industrial sheds, ensuring versatility.
tabDescriptions.Smart thermal insulation: Designed with materials such as PIR and EPS, Thermal Roofing offers excellent insulation, reducing the need for air conditioning and increasing internal comfort.

headline.title: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Polyisocyanurate Rigid Foam (PIR): thermal efficiency, sustainability and technology for modern constructions.

eps.title: EPS: Efficiency and Sustainability
eps.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam, is a lightweight and versatile material, widely used for its thermal and acoustic insulation properties. Additionally, it is 100% recyclable and does not emit substances harmful to the environment, making it a sustainable choice for various applications.
eps.subtitle: Main benefits of EPS:
eps.applicationsDescription: Used in thermal and acoustic insulation, packaging, civil construction, decoration and other applications. Ideal for commercial, industrial and residential buildings, ensuring energy efficiency, comfort and protection.

pir.title: PIR: High Technology and Safety
pir.description: Polyisocyanurate (PIR) is a high-performance insulating material, mainly used in the manufacture of thermal tiles and panels. Produced in an automated continuous line, PIR ensures superior thermal insulation and high fire resistance, being essential for industrial, commercial and residential projects.
pir.subtitle: Main benefits of PIR:

benefits.benefit6: Sustainable, in compliance with the Montreal Protocol

pirApplications.title: PIR Applications:
pirApplications.description: For covering and/or closing industrial and commercial buildings and warehouses, such as supermarkets, shopping centers, distribution and storage centers, hospitals, agribusiness, gyms and industries in general, including residences.

revestimentos.title: Types of coatings and Colors
revestimentos.description: Isoart PIR tiles and panels are available in different types of coatings and colors, ensuring flexibility in choice to meet the specific needs of each project.

tipos.filmeAluminio: Aluminum film with white or black face

revestimentos.aviso: Standard White RAL 9003. Other colors are suggestions, availability upon request.

linhaProducao.title: Automated production for maximum efficiency
linhaProducao.description: Isoart PIR tiles and panels are manufactured in a continuous and fully automated line, ensuring high precision, quality and sustainability. With Polyisocyanurate (PIR) insulating core and galvalume steel sheet coating, the process includes high-pressure injection, continuous pressing and automated cutting, ensuring excellent adhesion, finish and standardization. All products are automatically cooled, stacked and packaged, ready for shipping.

sustentabilidade.title: EPS Recycling: sustainability and intelligent reuse.
sustentabilidade.description: Expanded Polystyrene (EPS), popularly known as Styrofoam®, is a widely used and 100% recyclable material. Although not biodegradable, its recycling prevents environmental impacts by reducing the volume of waste in landfills.
sustentabilidade.aviso: Isoart has two internal recycling centers where it fully reuses the generated waste, reinforcing its commitment to sustainability.

heroHeadline.title: Innovative, sustainable and high-quality solutions in
heroHeadline.description: that meet the diverse demands of the market.

video.title: Isoart Institutional Video
video.caption: Since 2008, Isoart has been leading the market for innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) and Rigid Polyisocyanurate Foam (PIR), serving the most diverse demands of industries, constructions and other applications. With an unwavering commitment to quality, innovation and sustainability, the company has consolidated its position as a national reference in the sector.

timeline.title: A history marked by great successes:

2008.label: the first steps
2008.description: Founded in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná, Isoart began its journey with the purpose of offering innovative and sustainable solutions in Expanded Polystyrene (EPS). From the first moment, the company established a commitment to quality and transparency, serving different sectors with excellence and building a solid foundation of trust in the market.

2015.label: A new chapter
2015.description: The expansion to Xanxerê, Santa Catarina, marked a decisive point in Isoart's history. The inauguration of Factory 2 brought new opportunities, consolidating the company as one of the main EPS transforming industries in Brazil. This unit not only increased production capacity, but also reinforced the commitment to sustainability by focusing on industrialization and recycling of EPS products.

2021.label: Expand project
2021.description: With the launch of the expand project, Isoart inaugurated the modern Factory 3 in Santa Tereza do Oeste, Paraná. This facility represents a milestone in the company's evolution, designed to meet the demands of modern and sustainable constructions. Equipped with cutting-edge technology, Factory 3 produces thermal roofing and isopanels in continuous line, with insulating cores in Rigid Polyisocyanurate Foam, PIR, or EPS.

map.title: Service throughout Brazil, Paraguay and Uruguay.
map.description: Isoart has 3 strategically located factories in the western regions of Paraná and Santa Catarina, ensuring complete coverage throughout Brazilian, Paraguayan and Uruguayan territory with excellence and quality.

missao.title: Mission
missao.description: To satisfy customer needs, exceeding their expectations, through excellence in the manufacture and distribution of EPS products, generating innovative solutions, with profitability and respect for the environment.

visao.title: Vision
visao.description: To be recognized as the reference company in the sector in which it operates, adding social and economic value, within ethical and sustainable principles.

valores.title: Values
valores.description: Commitment to quality, excellence in service, respect for the environment, transparency in actions, valuing life, innovation and boldness.

quality.title: Quality policy
quality.description1: The Isoart Group, through the Quality Policy, establishes the guidelines by which it declares its commitment to customer, employee and community satisfaction.
quality.description2: In this sense, we seek continuous improvement of the Quality Management System, basing our actions on the following premises:

items.item1: Ensure customer satisfaction by offering quality products and services.
items.item2: Share our values, building lasting partnerships that result in gains for both parties.
items.item3: Maintain a good work environment, valuing safety and respect for life.
items.item4: Seek continuous improvement and process control via performance indicators, favoring the achievement and maintenance of competitive advantages.
items.item5: Promote sustainable actions aiming at minimal environmental impact.
items.item6: Train and qualify all employees to comply with the Quality Policy.
